Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1797284659118473216/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "H1, H2, Meta Title and Meta Description"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1797284659118473216/)_"
---
Write 5 H1 headings
15 H2 headings
5 Meta titles
5 Meta Descriptions
(H1 tag should include each word of keyword in any order)
(length for meta titles should be between 50 and 60 characters)
(length for meta description should be between 120 to 155 characters)
Provide Each h1, h2, meta title, and meta description in table form. The table should be in Column form.

The intent should be Commercial
[TARGETLANGUAGE]

[PROMPT]
PromptHint: [Keyword you want a H1, h2 , meta title and meta description for]
